00048         
00049 double AveragingQM::average_corner_gradients( EntityTopology type,
00050                                   uint32_t fixed_vertices,
00051                                   unsigned num_corner,
00052                                   double corner_values[],
00053                                   const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00054                                   Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00055                                   MsqError& err )
00056 {
00057   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00058   const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension(type);
00059   const unsigned per_vertex = dim+1;
00060   
00061   unsigned i, j, num_adj;
00062   const unsigned *adj_idx, *rev_idx;
00063   
00064     // NOTE: This function changes the corner_values array such that
00065     //       it contains the gradient coefficients.
00066   double avg = average_metric_and_weights( corner_values, num_corner, err );
00067   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00068 
00069   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
00070   {
00071     if (fixed_vertices & (1<<i))  // skip fixed vertices
00072       continue;
00073     
00074     adj_idx = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, num_adj );
00075     rev_idx = TopologyInfo::reverse_vertex_adjacency_offsets( type, i, num_adj );
00076     if (i < num_corner) // not all vertices are corners (e.g. pyramid)
00077       vertex_grads[i] = corner_values[i] * corner_grads[per_vertex*i];
00078     else
00079       vertex_grads[i] = 0;
00080     for (j = 0; j < num_adj; ++j)
00081     {
00082       const unsigned v = adj_idx[j], c = rev_idx[j]+1;
00083       if (v >= num_corner) // if less corners than vertices (e.g. pyramid apex)
00084         continue;
00085       vertex_grads[i] += corner_values[v] * corner_grads[per_vertex*v+c];
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00089   return avg;
00090 }
00091 
00100 class CornerHessDiagIterator 
00101 {
00102 private:
00103   const Matrix3D* cornerHess;    
00104   const EntityTopology elemType; 
00105   unsigned mCorner;              
00106 
00107   unsigned mStep;                
00108 public:
00109   CornerHessDiagIterator( const Matrix3D* corner_hessians, 
00110                           EntityTopology elem_type )
00111     : cornerHess(corner_hessians), 
00112       elemType(elem_type), 
00113       mCorner(0)
00114     {
00115       TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( elemType, mCorner, mStep );
00116       ++mStep;
00117     }
00118   
00119   SymMatrix3D operator*() const 
00120     { return cornerHess->upper(); }
00121   
00122   CornerHessDiagIterator& operator++()
00123     { 
00124       cornerHess += mStep;
00125       if (!--mStep) {
00126         TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( elemType, ++mCorner, mStep );
00127         ++mStep;
00128       }
00129       return *this;
00130     }
00131   
00132   CornerHessDiagIterator operator++(int)
00133     { CornerHessDiagIterator copy(*this); operator++(); return copy; }
00134 };
00135 
00136 template <typename HessIter>
00137 static inline 
00138 double sum_corner_diagonals( EntityTopology type,
00139                              unsigned num_corner,
00140                              const double corner_values[],
00141                              const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00142                              HessIter corner_diag_blocks,
00143                              Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00144                              SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[] )
00145 {
00146   unsigned i, n, r, R, idx[4];
00147   const unsigned* adj_list;
00148   double avg = 0.0;
00149   
00150     // calculate mean
00151   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00152     avg += corner_values[i];
00153 
00154   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00155   HessIter hess = corner_diag_blocks;
00156   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00157   {
00158     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00159     idx[0] = i;
00160     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00161     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00162     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00163 
00164     for (r = 0; r <= n; ++r) 
00165     {
00166       R = idx[r];
00167       vertex_grads[R] += *grad;
00168       vertex_hessians[R] += *hess;
00169       ++grad;
00170       ++hess;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   return avg;
00174 }
00175 
00176 template <typename HessIter>
00177 static inline 
00178 double sum_sqr_corner_diagonals( EntityTopology type,
00179                                  unsigned num_corner,
00180                                  const double corner_values[],
00181                                  const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00182                                  HessIter corner_diag_blocks,
00183                                  Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00184                                  SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[] )
00185 {
00186   unsigned i, n, r, R, idx[4];
00187   const unsigned* adj_list;
00188   double v, avg = 0.0;
00189   
00190     // calculate mean
00191   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00192     avg += corner_values[i]*corner_values[i];
00193 
00194   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00195   HessIter hess = corner_diag_blocks;
00196   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00197   {
00198     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00199     idx[0] = i;
00200     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00201     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00202     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00203     ++n;
00204 
00205     v = 2.0*corner_values[i];
00206     for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00207     {
00208       R = idx[r];
00209       vertex_grads[R] += v * *grad;
00210       vertex_hessians[R] += 2.0 * outer( *grad );
00211       vertex_hessians[R] += v * *hess;
00212       ++grad;
00213       ++hess;
00214     }
00215   }
00216   return avg;
00217 }
00218 
00219 template <typename HessIter>
00220 static inline 
00221 double pmean_corner_diagonals( EntityTopology type,
00222                                unsigned num_corner,
00223                                const double corner_values[],
00224                                const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00225                                HessIter corner_diag_blocks,
00226                                Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00227                                SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00228                                double p )
00229 {
00230   const unsigned N = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00231   unsigned i, n, r, R, idx[4];
00232   const unsigned* adj_list;
00233   double m = 0.0, nm;
00234   double gf[8], hf[8];
00235   double inv = 1.0/num_corner;
00236   assert(num_corner <= 8);
00237   
00238     // calculate mean
00239   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00240   {
00241     nm = pow(corner_values[i], p);
00242     m += nm;
00243     
00244     gf[i] = inv * p * nm / corner_values[i];
00245     hf[i] = (p-1) * gf[i] / corner_values[i];
00246   }
00247   nm = inv * m;
00248   
00249   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00250   HessIter hess = corner_diag_blocks;
00251   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00252   {
00253     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00254     idx[0] = i;
00255     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00256     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00257     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00258     ++n;
00259 
00260     for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00261     {
00262       R = idx[r];
00263       vertex_grads[R] += gf[i] * *grad;
00264       vertex_hessians[R] += hf[i] * outer( *grad );
00265       vertex_hessians[R] += gf[i] * *hess;
00266       ++grad;
00267       ++hess;
00268     }
00269   }
00270   
00271   m = pow( nm, 1.0/p );
00272   gf[0] = m / (p * nm );
00273   hf[0] = (1.0/p - 1) * gf[0] / nm;
00274   for (r = 0; r < N; ++r) 
00275   {
00276     vertex_hessians[r] *= gf[0];
00277     vertex_hessians[r] += hf[0] * outer( vertex_grads[r] );
00278     vertex_grads[r] *= gf[0];
00279   }
00280   
00281   return m;
00282 }
00283                                           
00284 
00285 template <typename HessIter>
00286 static inline
00287 double average_corner_diagonals( EntityTopology type,
00288                                  QualityMetric::AveragingMethod method,
00289                                  unsigned num_corner,
00290                                  const double corner_values[],
00291                                  const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00292                                  HessIter corner_diag_blocks,
00293                                  Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00294                                  SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00295                                  MsqError& err )
00296 {
00297   unsigned i;
00298   double avg, inv;
00299   
00300     // Zero gradients and Hessians
00301   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00302   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) {
00303     vertex_grads[i].set(0.0);
00304     vertex_hessians[i] = SymMatrix3D(0.0);
00305   }
00306   
00307   switch (method)
00308   {
00309   case QualityMetric::SUM:
00310     avg = sum_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00311                                corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00312                                vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00313     break;
00314   
00315   case QualityMetric::LINEAR:
00316     avg = sum_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00317                                corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00318                                vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00319     inv = 1.0/num_corner;
00320     avg *= inv;
00321     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) {
00322       vertex_grads[i] *= inv;
00323       vertex_hessians[i] *= inv;
00324     }
00325     break;
00326 
00327   case QualityMetric::SUM_SQUARED:
00328     avg = sum_sqr_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00329                                    corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00330                                    vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00331     break;
00332 
00333   case QualityMetric::RMS:
00334     avg = pmean_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00335                                  corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00336                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00337                                  2.0 );
00338     break;
00339 
00340   case QualityMetric::HARMONIC:
00341     avg = pmean_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00342                                  corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00343                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00344                                  -1.0 );
00345     break;
00346 
00347   case QualityMetric::HMS:
00348     avg = pmean_corner_diagonals( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00349                                  corner_grads, corner_diag_blocks,
00350                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00351                                  -2.0 );
00352     break;
00353 
00354   default:
00355     MSQ_SETERR(err)("averaging method not available.",MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00356     return 0.0;
00357   }
00358     
00359   return avg;
00360 }
00361 
00362 double AveragingQM::average_corner_hessian_diagonals( EntityTopology element_type,
00363                                               uint32_t ,
00364                                               unsigned num_corners,
00365                                               const double corner_values[],
00366                                               const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00367                                               const Matrix3D corner_hessians[],
00368                                               Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00369                                               SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00370                                               MsqError& err )
00371 {
00372   return average_corner_diagonals( element_type, avgMethod, num_corners,
00373                                    corner_values, corner_grads,
00374                                    CornerHessDiagIterator( corner_hessians, element_type ),
00375                                    vertex_grads, vertex_hessians, err );
00376 }
00377 
00378 double AveragingQM::average_corner_hessian_diagonals( EntityTopology element_type,
00379                                               uint32_t ,
00380                                               unsigned num_corners,
00381                                               const double corner_values[],
00382                                               const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00383                                               const SymMatrix3D corner_hess_diag[],
00384                                               Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00385                                               SymMatrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00386                                               MsqError& err )
00387 {
00388   return average_corner_diagonals( element_type, avgMethod, num_corners,
00389                                    corner_values, corner_grads,
00390                                    corner_hess_diag,
00391                                    vertex_grads, vertex_hessians, err );
00392 }
00393 
00394 static inline double sum_corner_hessians( EntityTopology type,
00395                                           unsigned num_corner,
00396                                           const double corner_values[],
00397                                           const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00398                                           const Matrix3D corner_hessians[],
00399                                           Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00400                                           Matrix3D vertex_hessians[] )
00401 {
00402   const unsigned N = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00403   unsigned i, n, r, c, R, C, idx[4];
00404   const unsigned* adj_list;
00405   double avg = 0.0;
00406   
00407     // calculate mean
00408   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00409     avg += corner_values[i];
00410 
00411   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00412   const Matrix3D* hess = corner_hessians;
00413   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00414   {
00415     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00416     idx[0] = i;
00417     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00418     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00419     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00420 
00421     for (r = 0; r <= n; ++r) 
00422     {
00423       R = idx[r];
00424       vertex_grads[R] += *grad;
00425       ++grad;
00426       for (c = r; c <= n; ++c) 
00427       {
00428         C = idx[c];
00429         if (R <= C)
00430           vertex_hessians[N*R - R*(R+1)/2 + C] += *hess;
00431         else 
00432           vertex_hessians[N*C - C*(C+1)/2 + R].plus_transpose_equal(*hess);
00433         ++hess;
00434       }
00435     }
00436   }
00437   return avg;
00438 }
00439 
00440 static inline double sum_sqr_corner_hessians( EntityTopology type,
00441                                               unsigned num_corner,
00442                                               const double corner_values[],
00443                                               const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00444                                               const Matrix3D corner_hessians[],
00445                                               Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00446                                               Matrix3D vertex_hessians[] )
00447 {
00448   const unsigned N = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00449   unsigned i, n, r, c, R, C, idx[4];
00450   const unsigned* adj_list;
00451   double v, avg = 0.0;
00452   Matrix3D op;
00453   
00454     // calculate mean
00455   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00456     avg += corner_values[i]*corner_values[i];
00457 
00458   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00459   const Matrix3D* hess = corner_hessians;
00460   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00461   {
00462     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00463     idx[0] = i;
00464     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00465     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00466     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00467     ++n;
00468 
00469     v = 2.0*corner_values[i];
00470     for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00471     {
00472       R = idx[r];
00473       vertex_grads[R] += v*grad[r];
00474       for (c = r; c < n; ++c) 
00475       {
00476         C = idx[c];
00477         op.outer_product( 2.0*grad[r], grad[c] );
00478         op += v * *hess;
00479         if (R <= C)
00480           vertex_hessians[N*R - R*(R+1)/2 + C] += op;
00481         else 
00482           vertex_hessians[N*C - C*(C+1)/2 + R].plus_transpose_equal(op);
00483         ++hess;
00484       }
00485     }
00486     grad += n;
00487   }
00488   return avg;
00489 }
00490 
00491 static inline double pmean_corner_hessians( EntityTopology type,
00492                                             unsigned num_corner,
00493                                             const double corner_values[],
00494                                             const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00495                                             const Matrix3D corner_hessians[],
00496                                             Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00497                                             Matrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00498                                             double p )
00499 {
00500   const unsigned N = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00501   unsigned i, n, r, c, R, C, idx[4];
00502   const unsigned* adj_list;
00503   double m = 0.0, nm;
00504   Matrix3D op;
00505   double gf[8], hf[8];
00506   double inv = 1.0/num_corner;
00507   assert(num_corner <= 8);
00508   
00509     // calculate mean
00510   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00511   {
00512     nm = pow(corner_values[i], p);
00513     m += nm;
00514     
00515     gf[i] = inv * p * nm / corner_values[i];
00516     hf[i] = (p-1) * gf[i] / corner_values[i];
00517   }
00518   nm = inv * m;
00519   
00520   const Vector3D* grad = corner_grads;
00521   const Matrix3D* hess = corner_hessians;
00522   for (i = 0; i < num_corner; ++i)
00523   {
00524     adj_list = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, i, n );
00525     idx[0] = i;
00526     idx[1] = adj_list[0];
00527     idx[2] = adj_list[1];
00528     idx[3] = adj_list[2%n]; // %n so don't read off end if 2D
00529     ++n;
00530 
00531     for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00532     {
00533       R = idx[r];
00534       vertex_grads[R] += gf[i]*grad[r];
00535       for (c = r; c < n; ++c) 
00536       {
00537         C = idx[c];
00538         op.outer_product( grad[r], grad[c] );
00539         op *= hf[i];
00540         op += gf[i] * *hess;
00541         if (R <= C)
00542           vertex_hessians[N*R - R*(R+1)/2 + C] += op;
00543         else 
00544           vertex_hessians[N*C - C*(C+1)/2 + R].plus_transpose_equal(op);
00545         ++hess;
00546       }
00547     }
00548     grad += n;
00549   }
00550   
00551   m = pow( nm, 1.0/p );
00552   gf[0] = m / (p * nm );
00553   hf[0] = (1.0/p - 1) * gf[0] / nm;
00554   for (r = 0; r < N; ++r) 
00555   {
00556     for (c = r; c < N; ++c)
00557     {
00558       op.outer_product( vertex_grads[r], vertex_grads[c] );
00559       op *= hf[0];
00560       *vertex_hessians *= gf[0];
00561       *vertex_hessians += op;
00562       ++vertex_hessians;
00563     }
00564     vertex_grads[r] *= gf[0];
00565   }
00566   
00567   return m;
00568 }
00569 
00570 
00571 double AveragingQM::average_corner_hessians( EntityTopology type,
00572                                      uint32_t ,
00573                                      unsigned num_corner,
00574                                      const double corner_values[],
00575                                      const Vector3D corner_grads[],
00576                                      const Matrix3D corner_hessians[],
00577                                      Vector3D vertex_grads[],
00578                                      Matrix3D vertex_hessians[],
00579                                      MsqError& err )
00580 {
00581   unsigned i;
00582   double avg, inv;
00583   
00584     // Zero gradients and Hessians
00585   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00586   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
00587     vertex_grads[i].set(0.0);
00588   const unsigned num_hess = num_vertex * (num_vertex+1) / 2;
00589   for (i = 0; i < num_hess; ++i)
00590     vertex_hessians[i].zero();
00591   
00592   switch (avgMethod)
00593   {
00594   case QualityMetric::SUM:
00595     avg = sum_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00596                                corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00597                                vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00598     break;
00599   
00600   case QualityMetric::LINEAR:
00601     avg = sum_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00602                                corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00603                                vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00604     inv = 1.0/num_corner;
00605     avg *= inv;
00606     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
00607       vertex_grads[i] *= inv;
00608     for (i = 0; i < num_hess; ++i)
00609       vertex_hessians[i] *= inv;
00610     break;
00611 
00612   case QualityMetric::SUM_SQUARED:
00613     avg = sum_sqr_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00614                                    corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00615                                    vertex_grads, vertex_hessians );
00616     break;
00617 
00618   case QualityMetric::RMS:
00619     avg = pmean_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00620                                  corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00621                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00622                                  2.0 );
00623     break;
00624 
00625   case QualityMetric::HARMONIC:
00626     avg = pmean_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00627                                  corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00628                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00629                                  -1.0 );
00630     break;
00631 
00632   case QualityMetric::HMS:
00633     avg = pmean_corner_hessians( type, num_corner, corner_values, 
00634                                  corner_grads, corner_hessians,
00635                                  vertex_grads, vertex_hessians,
00636                                  -2.0 );
00637     break;
00638 
00639   default:
00640     MSQ_SETERR(err)("averaging method not available.",MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00641     return 0.0;
00642   }
00643     
00644   return avg;
00645 }
00646 
00647 double AveragingQM::average_metric_and_weights( double metrics[],
00648                                                   int count, 
00649                                                   MsqError& err )
00650 {
00651   static bool min_max_warning = false;
00652   double avg = 0.0;
00653   int i, tmp_count;
00654   double f;
00655   
00656   switch (avgMethod)
00657   {
00658   
00659   case QualityMetric::MINIMUM:
00660     if (!min_max_warning) {
00661       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) <<
00662         "Minimum and maximum not continuously differentiable.\n"
00663         "Element of subdifferential will be returned.\n";
00664       min_max_warning = true;
00665     }
00666 
00667     avg = metrics[0];
00668     for (i = 1; i < count; ++i)
00669       if (metrics[i] < avg)
00670         avg = metrics[i];
00671     
00672     tmp_count = 0;
00673     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00674     {
00675       if( metrics[i] - avg <= MSQ_MIN )
00676       {
00677         metrics[i] = 1.0;
00678         ++tmp_count;
00679       }
00680       else
00681       {
00682         metrics[i] = 0.0;
00683       }
00684     }
00685     
00686     f = 1.0 / tmp_count;
00687     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00688       metrics[i] *= f;
00689       
00690     break;
00691 
00692   
00693   case QualityMetric::MAXIMUM:
00694     if (!min_max_warning) {
00695       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) <<
00696         "Minimum and maximum not continuously differentiable.\n"
00697         "Element of subdifferential will be returned.\n";
00698       min_max_warning = true;
00699     }
00700 
00701     avg = metrics[0];
00702     for (i = 1; i < count; ++i)
00703       if (metrics[i] > avg)
00704         avg = metrics[i];
00705     
00706     tmp_count = 0;
00707     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00708     {
00709       if( avg - metrics[i] <= MSQ_MIN )
00710       {
00711         metrics[i] = 1.0;
00712         ++tmp_count;
00713       }
00714       else
00715       {
00716         metrics[i] = 0.0;
00717       }
00718     }
00719     
00720     f = 1.0 / tmp_count;
00721     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00722       metrics[i] *= f;
00723       
00724     break;
00725 
00726   
00727   case QualityMetric::SUM:
00728     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00729     {
00730       avg += metrics[i];
00731       metrics[i] = 1.0;
00732     }
00733       
00734     break;
00735 
00736   
00737   case QualityMetric::SUM_SQUARED:
00738     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00739     {
00740       avg += (metrics[i]*metrics[i]);
00741       metrics[i] *= 2;
00742     }
00743       
00744     break;
00745 
00746   
00747   case QualityMetric::LINEAR:
00748     f = 1.0 / count;
00749     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00750     {
00751       avg += metrics[i];
00752       metrics[i] = f;
00753     }
00754     avg *= f;
00755       
00756     break;
00757 
00758   
00759   case QualityMetric::GEOMETRIC:
00760     avg = 1.0;
00761     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00762       avg *= metrics[i];
00763     avg = pow( avg, 1.0/count );
00764 
00765     f = avg / count;
00766     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00767       metrics[i] = f / metrics[i];
00768       
00769     break;
00770 
00771   
00772   case QualityMetric::RMS:
00773     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00774       avg += metrics[i] * metrics[i];
00775     avg = sqrt( avg / count );
00776     
00777     f = 1. / (avg*count);
00778     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00779       metrics[i] *= f;
00780       
00781     break;
00782 
00783   
00784   case QualityMetric::HARMONIC:
00785     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00786       avg += 1.0 / metrics[i];
00787     avg = count / avg;
00788   
00789     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00790       metrics[i] = (avg * avg) / (count * metrics[i] * metrics[i]);
00791       
00792     break;
00793 
00794   
00795   case QualityMetric::HMS:
00796     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00797       avg += 1. / (metrics[i] * metrics[i]);
00798     avg = sqrt( count / avg );
00799     
00800     f = avg*avg*avg / count;
00801     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00802       metrics[i] = f / (metrics[i] * metrics[i] * metrics[i]);
00803       
00804     break;
00805 
00806   
00807   default:
00808     MSQ_SETERR(err)("averaging method not available.",MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00809   }
00810   
00811   return avg;
00812 }
00813 
00814    
00815 
00820 double AveragingQM::average_metrics( const double metric_values[],
00821                                      int num_values, MsqError &err)
00822 {
00823     //MSQ_MAX needs to be made global?
00824   //double MSQ_MAX=1e10;
00825   double total_value=0.0;
00826   double temp_value=0.0;
00827   int i=0;
00828   int j=0;
00829     //if no values, return zero
00830   if (num_values<=0){
00831     return 0.0;
00832   }
00833 
00834   switch(avgMethod){
00835     case QualityMetric::GEOMETRIC:
00836        total_value=1.0;
00837        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00838          total_value*=(metric_values[i]);
00839        }
00840        total_value=pow(total_value, 1.0/num_values);
00841        break;
00842 
00843     case QualityMetric::HARMONIC:
00844          //ensure no divide by zero, return zero
00845        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00846          if(metric_values[i]<MSQ_MIN){
00847            if(metric_values[i]>MSQ_MIN){
00848              return 0.0;
00849            }
00850          }
00851          total_value+=(1/metric_values[i]);
00852        }
00853          //ensure no divide by zero, return MSQ_MAX_CAP
00854        if(total_value<MSQ_MIN){
00855          if(total_value>MSQ_MIN){
00856            return MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00857          }
00858        }
00859        total_value=num_values/total_value;
00860        break;
00861 
00862     case QualityMetric::LINEAR:
00863        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00864          total_value+=metric_values[i];
00865        }
00866        total_value/= (double) num_values;
00867        break;
00868 
00869     case QualityMetric::MAXIMUM:
00870        total_value = metric_values[0];
00871        for (i = 1; i < num_values; ++i){
00872          if (metric_values[i] > total_value){
00873            total_value = metric_values[i];
00874          }
00875        }
00876        break;
00877 
00878     case QualityMetric::MINIMUM:
00879        total_value = metric_values[0];
00880        for (i = 1; i < num_values; ++i){
00881          if (metric_values[i] < total_value) {
00882            total_value = metric_values[i];
00883          }
00884        }
00885        break;
00886 
00887     case QualityMetric::RMS:
00888        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00889          total_value+=(metric_values[i]*metric_values[i]);
00890        }
00891        total_value/= (double) num_values;
00892        total_value=sqrt(total_value);
00893        break;
00894 
00895     case QualityMetric::HMS:
00896        //ensure no divide by zero, return zero
00897        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00898          if (metric_values[i]*metric_values[i] < MSQ_MIN) {
00899            return 0.0;
00900          }
00901          total_value += (1.0/(metric_values[i]*metric_values[i]));
00902        }
00903 
00904        //ensure no divide by zero, return MSQ_MAX_CAP
00905        if (total_value < MSQ_MIN) {
00906          return MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00907        }
00908        total_value = sqrt(num_values/total_value);
00909        break;
00910 
00911     case QualityMetric::STANDARD_DEVIATION:
00912        total_value=0;
00913        temp_value=0;
00914        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00915          temp_value+=metric_values[i];
00916          total_value+=(metric_values[i]*metric_values[i]);
00917        }
00918        temp_value/= (double) num_values;
00919        temp_value*=temp_value;
00920        total_value/= (double) num_values;
00921        total_value=total_value-temp_value;
00922        break;
00923 
00924     case QualityMetric::SUM:
00925        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00926          total_value+=metric_values[i];
00927        }
00928        break;
00929 
00930     case QualityMetric::SUM_SQUARED:
00931        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00932          total_value+= (metric_values[i]*metric_values[i]);
00933        }
00934        break;
00935 
00936     case QualityMetric::MAX_MINUS_MIN:
00937        //total_value used to store the maximum
00938          //temp_value used to store the minimum
00939        temp_value=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00940        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00941          if(metric_values[i]<temp_value){
00942            temp_value=metric_values[i];
00943          }
00944          if(metric_values[i]>total_value){
00945            total_value=metric_values[i];
00946          }
00947        }
00948 
00949        total_value-=temp_value;
00950        break;
00951 
00952     case QualityMetric::MAX_OVER_MIN:
00953          //total_value used to store the maximum
00954          //temp_value used to store the minimum
00955        temp_value=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00956        for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00957          if(metric_values[i]<temp_value){
00958            temp_value=metric_values[i];
00959          }
00960          if(metric_values[i]>total_value){
00961            total_value=metric_values[i];
00962          }
00963        }
00964 
00965          //ensure no divide by zero, return MSQ_MAX_CAP
00966        if (fabs(temp_value) < MSQ_MIN) {
00967          return MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00968        }
00969        total_value/=temp_value;
00970        break;
00971 
00972     case QualityMetric::SUM_OF_RATIOS_SQUARED:
00973        for (j=0;j<num_values;++j){
00974          //ensure no divide by zero, return MSQ_MAX_CAP
00975          if (fabs(metric_values[j]) < MSQ_MIN) {
00976            return MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00977          }
00978          for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00979            total_value+=((metric_values[i]/metric_values[j])*
00980                          (metric_values[i]/metric_values[j]));
00981          }
00982        }
00983        total_value/=(double)(num_values*num_values);
00984        break;
00985 
00986     default:
00987          //Return error saying Averaging Method mode not implemented
00988        MSQ_SETERR(err)("Requested Averaging Method Not Implemented", MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00989        return 0;
00990   }
00991   return total_value;
00992 }
